ygData.subject: Re: Gear choices, need some advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Head: Stick with runed circlet/crown of leaves for now - aim for nightshade wreath in the future :) Arms: Personally, I would go for Platinum armbands at your
ygData.messageBody:
Head:
Stick with runed circlet/crown of leaves for now - aim for nightshade wreath
in the future :)

Arms:
Personally, I would go for Platinum armbands at your level (ac0, +3str,
+3wis)

Legs:
Yup - Gatorscale looks like leather - ewwwww (I refused to wear them in a
fashion fit)
I wore plate leggings instead (bronze, steel, rubi, silver-plated, EM -
depending on my level)
The cleric legs aren't that great (ac11, +5sv poison, +5int) - ick. If the
quests become easier, maybe, but for now, I wouldn't even bother trying -
massive waste of time.

Just my 2pp of course ;)

~Sirensa
Solusek Ro
